testcase.name: Nopcommerce valid Register Test

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given User should able to open browser......................................passed And Enter URL...............................................................passed When User click on the register link........................................passed Then User should be on register page........................................passed And Verify register page title..............................................passed Then User should be able to select gender male or female....................passed Then User should able enter firstname and lastname..........................passed Then User should abele to select date of Date of BirthDay,BirthMonth and BirthYear.passed Then User enter valid email address.........................................undefined Then User enter company name................................................skipped Then User able to tick the Newsletter tick-box..............................skipped Then User enter the password................................................skipped And User enter the password to confirm......................................skipped And User finally able to click on register button...........................skipped And User should be on register successfully.................................skipped Then User can close the browser.............................................skipped
